articles.description: As the final grand slam of 2022 comes to an end, which saw Iga Swiatek and Carlos Alcaraz crowned champions and Serena Williams hang up her racquet, we take a look at some of our favourite images from Flushing Meadows
articles.content: As the final grand slam of 2022 comes to an end, which saw Iga Swiatek and Carlos Alcaraz crowned champions and Serena Williams hang up her racquet, we take a look at some of our favourite images fro… [+17 chars]
